verbs.description: President Donald Trump [V: is] preparing to block German luxury carmakers from the U.S. market , according to an exclusive report by German magazine WirtschaftsWoche .
[ARG0: President Donald Trump] is [V: preparing] [ARG2: to block German luxury carmakers from the U.S. market] , [ARGM-ADV: according to an exclusive report by German magazine WirtschaftsWoche] .
[ARG0: President Donald Trump] is preparing to [V: block] [ARG1: German luxury carmakers] [ARG2: from the U.S. market] , according to an exclusive report by German magazine WirtschaftsWoche .
President Donald Trump is preparing to block German luxury carmakers from the U.S. market , [V: according] to an exclusive report by German magazine WirtschaftsWoche .
